name: N C Anil Kumar
top_product: VRF Air Conditioning
ideal_referral: Ideal Client Referrals for Hanuman Enterprises (HVAC)* 1. Commercial and Residential Property Developers: • Engaged in new construction projects requiring comprehensive HVAC system design and installation. ￼ 2. Facility and Building Managers: • Overseeing properties experiencing HVAC inefficiencies, inconsistent temperatures, or outdated systems needing upgrades. 3. Business Owners and Office Managers: • Seeking energy-efficient solutions to reduce operational costs and improve indoor air quality. 4. Educational and Healthcare Institutions: • In need of reliable HVAC systems to maintain optimal environments for students, patients, and staff.
top_problem_solved: Fourteen years ago, Hanuman Enterprises achieved a significant milestone by executing the HVAC system for Ramky Grandiose, the 17-floor corporate headquarters of the Ramky Group in Hyderabad. This project was a pioneering effort, being the first high-rise building in the city to implement a full-scale VRF (Variable Refrigerant Flow) air-conditioning system across all floors. Despite the challenges posed by vertical integration, system balancing, and coordination with multiple stakeholders, our team delivered a seamless, energy-efficient solution that set a new benchmark for high-rise HVAC installations in Hyderabad. This landmark project underscores our commitment to innovation, technical excellence, and client satisfaction in the HVAC industry.

name: Shashidhar Komaravolu
top_product: Home Medical Nursing: Primarily on treating and managing a patient's medical condition with the goal of recovery and returning to independence. Services: - Wound care - Medication management - Injections - Monitoring vital signs - Post-surgical care - Physical therapy Duration: Short-term (weeks) or long-term (months), depending on the patient's needs and progress. Goal: To help the patient to regain their health and independence at home where feasible or to manage them till end of natural life. Home Palliative Nursing: Focus: On improving the quality of life for individuals with serious illnesses, by managing symptoms and providing comfort. Services: - Pain management - Symptom control (e.g., nausea, fatigue, difficulty breathing) - Emotional and spiritual support - Counseling and support for families - Coordination of care with other healthcare providers Duration: Provided over an extended period, alongside curative treatments, for individuals living with chronic, progressive illnesses. Goal: To enhance the patient's comfort and well-being by addressing physical, emotional, social, and spiritual needs.
ideal_referral: Medical and Healthcare Professionals: General Practitioners (GPs): who can refer patients to for specialized care or services that they don't directly provide. Specialists: Physiotherapists, orthopaedists, cardiologists, neurologists, psychiatrists and other medical / rehabilitation specialists. Hospitals and Clinics: Local hospitals and clinics to refer patients for post-operative care, rehabilitation, or other homecare services. Allied Health Professionals: Chiropractors, massage therapists, and other allied health professionals often work with clients who could benefit from Eira's services. Community and Social Services: Senior Centers and Retirement Communities. Community Centers and Support Groups: Organizations that focus on specific health conditions support groups for people with chronic illnesses, cancer support groups, stroke survivors, dementia carer groups, etc. Home Health Agencies: Agencies that are providing in-home care and could refer clients to Eira Healthcare for additional services. Other Businesses / centers: Rehabilitation centers / hospices / palliative care institutions. Employers: Employers wishing to offer wellness / homecare programs to their employees to partner with Eira Healthcare to provide healthcare services to family dependents of employee's
top_problem_solved: Availability of top quality nursing and patient care at the home of the patient is the most cited issue and challenge for families, especially those patients suffering from chronic or terminal illness. Another issue most often cited is lack of understanding of the disease progression and prognosis of the condition. Eira Healthcare has succeeded in providing these high quality interventions consistently in the comfort of the patient's home and to offer quality insights, education about the condition and helped handhold the patient and family to better plan and manage their care at home.
my_favourite_bni_story: My BNI network has been an amazing source of information and service, on demand. I would like to share a short story that reinforced my belief in the power of the network how far it can go to extend the support I needed. In my gated community, we had a major electrical breakdown requiring procurement of outdated electrical switchgear, it was obvious that the older models were no longer available... however, the situaiton demanded purchase of the older versons only due to fitment concerns. The alternate was to incur major expenditure far exceeding budget available. I posted this requirement in my BNI chapter group and within 2 hours the equipment was procured and delivered even! My fellow chapter members were able to locate specific supplier and have the same delivered at short notice.
